reviewText:
The story was compelling and informative.  The mixture of original footage and real time re-inaction was well done, as were the interviews.  Such a tragic and horrific time dealt with respect and understanding by this storyteller. The outcome, although so sad, was mitigated by the post war interviews with the few survivors and their amazing strength of spirit.
Thank you for a job very well done.
So sad!  NEVER AGAIN!
interesting
It was based on a true story. Quite informative.

This was an awesome documentary.  So well done !!!!!  I learned about this escape in Poland, and I had never heard the story before.  Totally worth watching.  It is a story of brave people who endured more than most of us could imagine.
Great caption of the events
Using it in my classroom. The kids are engrossed.
Very interesting movie!  Did not know about SOBIBOR  before viewing this film.
I think makes you realize what horrible conditions that the Jewish people had to endure.
Interesting first person movie.
I enjoyed this movie alot!
This was a great documentary. I showed it to my 7th and 8th graders and they were intrigued.
10 Stars!!!
Inspiradora.
this is a true story.  i enjoyed it.

This film provides a well crafted look at a terrible time in the world's history. I watched it with my thirteen year old grandson and was impressed with how well it held his attention, while teaching valuable lessons.

Escape !  Riveting account of the up-rise  by  prisoners of Sobibor  extermination camp in Poland, 1942-43 . In the account of the only camp from  anyone escaped still thousands were liquidated. Of the hundreds that managed to reach ( freedom )  all but 50 or so were caught and killed.  This  was to be the only  " victory " of the ( Die Endlosung )  Final Solution .  Very well put togehter film. taken in most part from history .
A real life thriller!! It shows how the human spirit can survive in the worst of circumstances!1
A profile of great courage in the hell of the holocaust.
very interesting.  such a sad story but it must be told!
Interesting

We must never forget, this documentary tells the story of Sobibor one of the camps built only for death.

Highly recommened

This was a very moving, account of events that happened in Sobibor. I would recommend this film to any person who is willing to keep the light alive as to the horrors of Nazi Germany and the resilience and defiance  of the brave men and Jewish women who fought for their freedom, dignity and humanity.
Eye opening
Amazing story, so glas they had a chance to tell their story.
Important story but not very well told. Reenactment scenes are poorly done and take away from the actual stories told by survivors. Comes across like a low budget crime show. Extremely disappointed.
Amazing story of courage and survival!
Everyone should see this
a sad and horrible part of history, they fought so hard to get out and so many died
Touching semi-documentary, had never heard of the camp or the escape.
A brave story.
Such an interesting true story.
This is a very good documentary type story of an escape from a WWII Nazionale death camp.
I had no idea this had occurred. It was interesting to learn something new.
Excellent well done
We can never be allowed to forget what evil can exist.
Very probably.  Interesting twist, one we don't think of.
Well done. Informative. Very sad
Outstanding. What incredible bravery.

We must never forget. Those that share this horror must be listened to and encouraged for there is very few survivors left. My family thank you from the bottom of our hearts for being so brave as to expose such wickedness in this world. Please know millions of us commend you for this bravely. Thank you and this is a wonderful testimony of one man's nightmare, who took the steps to speak out for the millions that died at the hands of the Nazis.
It was interesting
heart breake true story , not for drama people . this movie for people who love this true story.
Excellent movie. Being able to interview some of the real people that escape is priceless. How those hearts and minds suffered. Historical and informative movie.
Amazing telling of an heroic story.
enlighten!
Was quite interesting.  Had some facts about concentration camps I had not realized before.

Solid recreation of this survival story. The whole film is very enjoyable. You can feel the tension growing up as the prisoners prepare the escape not knowing whether a traitor or a nazi could ruin their plan.
the narrator was the first distraction.  he sounded like he was from a reality show like wife swap.. just too upbeat and corny.  the characters just didn't pull me in.

The thinking of 1 man who lead lots of innocent victim to freedom was the best part of it all!  It may have taken years but the goal was to get freed from the authority of the Germans!  Many years, the German killed and enslaved people everyday.  Must see movie and lean from their unique freedom!

I didn't know in WWII someone could it escape from nazis camp... This man and women touch my heart a
very educational
Excellent movie.

This documentary presents stories from other people in the camp and presents some different facts about the timing of things, so I found it extremely informative and authentic.  I watched a movie right after watching this called Escape from Sobibor and I also remember interviews that more closely resemble that movie.  All three are worth watching and I am sorry I don't remember the other interview titles, but they had interviewed some survivors the movie had probably been based on.  There is a website online with interviews from Sobibor survivors from 1983-1984.
Excellent documentary of such a horrendous experience!
Must watch
Sad, inspiring, bittersweet, and well done.
I love reading and watching history. It's good to know the evil done at the Nazi camps.
excellent.
THAT IS A FANTASTIC MOVIE. IV'E ONLY MET ONE SURVIVER OF HITLER'S DEATH CAMP HERE IN DALLAS TX.  "MAX" GOLDBERG

It is hard to embrace the hatred and brutality harbored by Nazi Germany during WWII.  Once again we are reminded through this film.  One must admire the courage and stamina of the millions of Jews interned by the SS machine.
Very good. Count your blessings!!
sad yet Amazing at the same time .

I was really impressed with this presentation.  It's a sad topic, but covered very well.  It follows along with actual survivors from the death camp escape.  The writing on this production makes you wonder-what-is-going-to-happen-next.  An aspect I wasn't expecting, but was pleasantly surprised.  I also thought it was wonderful to discover that some people (sadly only a few) were able to conquer and escape a death camp.  These survivors are the bravest of the brave, able to overcome evil and I honor them and those who did not survive the escape.

(Warning: As you can imagine this is a subject that deals with cruelty, death and killing)
Great documentary about what mankind will do to others in the name of power and politics.
Fantastic documentary.
I never knew this one. Sad stories from survivers.
Very well made. Even though this is biography/documentary, it kept me on the edge of my seat. I'm inspired by such courageous people who lived amongst such unfounded hatred. L'Chaim!
love this ...love history of WWII and this was an eye opener for me

It was very well done, with real witnesses interposed with well acted dramatization.  I didn't know this story of the Holocaust.  It's hard to describe the story as anything but tragic of course, but it was a heroic one told in a gripping way.
Love learning about history (Learner#1) and this gave me a little more insight into the Jewish Holocaust and was quite interesting.
Very well done

Great from Beginning to End.
Heart breaking documentary but, it is comforting to know that some victims successfully fought back.
I love documentaries and this one was great. I love the interviews with actual survivors. WWII documentaries are my favorite and this one did not disappoint.

A phenomenal story of bravery.  This is a remarkable documentary.

watch the movie ESCAPE FROM SOBIBOR............True story...great movie...saw it many many times....my father and my grandma were polish and had to hide all the time from hitler......i don't know how,they never really talked about it....but my father was 5 then and it impacted his whole life until the end......R.I.P to ALL who didn't survive and may god bless all the survivors who are still alive......Heaven is waiting for all of you....amen.
If you really want to experience how the death camps were, this shocking footage takes you there.
A real heart pounder based on history.
A pinpoint of light in the darkness.
It is unbelievable what people can do to each other.
These were very brave people.  An unreal undertaking with the possible risks.

What can I say---what happened during this period was and still is so unbelieveable.  But it is true and we have to take care that this never happens again.  I watch movies like this because I could not understand why the US did not get involved sooner.  After watching movies regarding the US involvement and why the US did not jump in right away, I am more forgiving of the US and understand our motives.  This period of time is so over whelming.  I had a total misconception of the US employment.

What a great heroic story of Russian soldiers leading and coordinating prisoners in death camps to come together to make the greatest escape ever from a Nazi death camp. Wow!!!

It was nice the actual
People were in the movie.
very good documentary of the  WW11 war crimes. Actual survivors narrate their experinces.

My heart goes out to all the men, woman and children who were murdered so brutally and to the survivors who lost family and who carry those terrible memories. Those who are guilty of surviving or with the "what if's". These men and woman are one of the most courageous and bravest people I have had the pleasure in hearing their story. God Bless.
I did not watch this, but my husband thought it was excellent.
Wonderful

This is a very sad comment on the human race.  How could we do this kind of violence to another human being, it is beyond me.  This is shocking "reality."  Only Satan could be behind the Nazi Death Camps and those who participated in the cruelty. Good educational movie.
It was a well done documentary, and it is amazing that human beings can do such things to one another.

This movie showed how the Nazi processed the Jews coming into their Death Camps.  They got off the railroad car and were directed into a room and told to put luggage and other belongs in one area.  Then told to undress and put clothing on a special hook and to remember the number so that their shower they could find their clothing.  They were directed into this room for their showers and the door was slammed shut and locked.  Then the poisonous gas came out of shower heads and the people died from the fumes.  The selected Jewish men then moved the bodies on carts and down elevator to where the furnace was located and two men per body threw corpses into furnace and when full they shut the doors.  These selected Jewish men than went through the luggage and belongs looking for items that would make money for the Nazi.  Then ashes were gone through looking for gold teeth or any thing worth money for the Nazi.  These selected Jewish men were feed better and also has all the wine they could eat.  But these groups of men knew that they had a certain time to serve in this capacity and then they would be gassed and burned.  The women hid gun powder for the men to blow up the furnaces but the Nazi's found out and tortured the women to find out where the gun powder was hidden but they wouldn't tell them so they were tortured until they died.  The men in the one select group of Jewish men finally were able to blow up the furnaces and they escaped the death camp.  The was awful and showed just how inhumane the Nazi's were. Also a glimpse was shown of the medical experiments done on the people in the death camp which resulted in their death also.
I thought this was extremely well done and informative.
Really a well done documentary on a little know escape plan.  This is very educational, interesting, heartbreaking, and a must see.
Ok
Great story
Hood documentary

This one of those amazing, I can't believe it happened stories of WW2. This film tells the story of a Nazi extermination camp gassing thousands of Jews and how the masses of prisoners rose up to breakout. Of all that took part in the breakout some were successful and lived to tell their stories. The combination of re-enactment and the interviews of the living participants make for a good story. The participation of Russian prisoners was unexpected and vital to the story. Highly recommended.
Well documented program arousing us to the evilness of the days and people.
Great documentary about a daring escape by death camp prisoners as told by the survivors 70 years later.
Powerful and well done!  Engrossing and moving.

I simply cannot comprehend these atrocities and I am awed and amazed at the strength, courage and resiliency of these women and men.
The film was engaging and informative and I am glad I was exposed to the important content it showcases.
Good doc

Although difficult to watch the abuse that the Nazi's used on innocent victims, I feel that everyone should know what happened and never allow it to happen again! In that respect, it was an educating documentary that was well done.
Sorry,  I only see prime movies with my membership.  I did not order or purchase these digital orders.  Adjust my account accordlingly.  Thanks!  Other than this I am extremely pleased with AMAZON.
Such a good movie
I never heard this story before.  It is heartwarming, dramatic and a little sad.  An interesting account of an amazing piece of history.

Always remember.  So very sad, but it does have a glimmer of a happy ending.  I didn't give it five stars only because one shouldn't love a documentary about the Holocaust.  This is about a camp we don't hear that much about.
Great documentary

Very good movie. I am glad the movie was made to document the tragedy and escape.
Great history.
This is a well done movie about a subject that has been covered many times before.  The pace is fairly slow but the movie is well acted and feels very authentic.
Very informative about almost forgotten history that is presented in a way that was easy to follow and yet grasp the challenges they faced.

This was a very intriguing story as I has never known that there has been an actual breakout of a Nazi prison camp. To hear from some of these survivors give their insight on this prison is something no history book can teach. This is a must see for anyone that is a history buff.
Very interesting book, really was fascinated by the story.
Excellent and very educational

A good documentary of a story many have never heard of.
Add it to your "must see" list

Im into documentaries, and this used to be a widely covered topic when i was in school so it still interests me to this day.. good info and it wasn't boring..

Interesting enough. I have seen all the free Prime movies on the Nazis and camps and refuse to pay  for those Amazon and others want money for. mostly documentaries..are you kidding? Pay? Not happening.
  But EVERYONE needs to know what happened and how it happened and how people managed to survive.
Very informative with information not widely known
An important story about brutality, oppression and the survival of hope.
Very interesting and informative movie. Would recommend all to watch and see the atrocities committed by the enemy during WWII.
This is story that needs to be told and known. I had no clue there was ever a successful escape by Jews from a Nazi Concentration Camp. Thanks for telling the story!
Very informative.
Great truth!
Excellent documentary!!!

NOT BAD.

Excellent
